attributes.action: award a Knighthood to Radio One's Chris Moyles for services to Radio and Charity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The “Saviour of Radio One” deserves to be recognised with a Knighthood for services to radio.  Chris has worked his way from hospital radio to the countries flagship radio show.  Chris brings joys to millions each morning, and his numbers grows with his continued excellence.  Chris is also tireless charity worker raising millions for Comic Relief, and other charities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
